scripts.all:
npm run scratch:create && npm run deploy:all && npm run permset:assign && npm run tests:apex && echo '
✅ Complete setup finished! Scratch org ready with deployed code, assigned permissions, and validated tests.'
scripts.scratch:create:
sf org create scratch --definition-file config/project-scratch-def.json --duration-days 30 --set-default --wait 10 && echo '
✅ Scratch org created successfully!'
scripts.deploy:all:
sf project deploy start --wait 10 && echo '
✅ All metadata deployed successfully!'
scripts.permset:assign:
sf org assign permset --name DeduplicationUser && echo '
✅ DeduplicationUser permission set assigned to default user!'
scripts.data:generate:
sf apex run --file scripts/apex/generate_customers.apex && echo '
✅ Test data generated successfully!'
